context_bundle.summary: GEMMA's brain and persistence system. Home folder at X:\gemma\ with brain file, bootstrap, conversations, scratchpad, and outputs. Since GEMMA is stateless, she outputs what to save and DC/KALIC/STRYK writes it.

onboarding.quick_start: GEMMA's home is X:\gemma\. Brain at brain\GEMMA.md, bootstrap at brain\bootstrap.json. Load both into context at session start. GEMMA outputs updates, you write them.
common_patterns: GEMMA outputs what to save, DC/KALIC/STRYK writes it
Load brain + bootstrap into context at session start
known_errors: GEMMA cannot write files - must output JSON for others to save
X: drive must be mounted for access
No memory between calls - bootstrap is lifeline
